name: The Quivering
description: Classic Retro point and click adventure from yesteryear. Set in the dark and foreboding village of Warty Hollow, The Quivering follows the fortunes of young Spud, as he tries to save his uncle, Olivetti Franken-Stamp, from the diabolical spell cast upon him by the big cheese from Hell, Big D.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8 / 7 / Vista / XP Processor: Pentium 800 Mhz or higher Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: SVGA video card capable of 1024x768 and 24-bit color Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: 100% compatible WindowsÂ® 16-bit sound card and drivers
